entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
